scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build && cd .. && copyfiles -u 2 'client/build/**/*' dist/client
scripts.install: npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.install:client: symlink-dir server/src client/src/server && cd client && npm install
scripts.watch: concurrently --names client,server "cd client && npm run watch" "cd server && npm run watch"
